Headline: #7 Harrison Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Harrison/Kolmar
ShortDescription: Eastbound 7 Harrison buses are temporarily rerouted due to street blockage.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #7 Harrison buses are temporarily rerouted via Harrison, Cicero, Jackson, Kostner, 5th Ave, and resume normal route, due to street blockage near Harrison/Kolmar.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
